title: PHP Conditionals
description: Practice using if, else if, and else statements for decision making in PHP.

examples.input:
<?php
$score = 85;
if ($score >= 90) {
  echo "Grade: A";
} elseif ($score >= 75) {
  echo "Grade: B";
} else {
  echo "Grade: C";
}
?>

constraints: Use at least one if, one elseif, and one else statement.
Check different conditions to print different outputs.
starterCode:
<?php
$score = 70; // change value to test

// Write your if-elseif-else statements here
?>
hints: Use if(condition) { ... } for the first case.
Use else for the default case.
